1105264038001274880.text: Make money from markets you create. You can charge participants a fee when they settle and have the option of sharing trading fees with @veil as well.

1105264037363834887.text: Collect orders for your draft markets before they’re activated. Trades won’t be executed until the market is active, but you’ll be able to gather commitments and gauge interest in your market without paying to create it! ( @0xProject )

1105264034234851329.text: Create draft markets for free. Update details of your market or change the color scheme as much as you want before activating it (i.e. persisting it to @AugurProject).

1099805290646519808.text: With the most recent update from @ethereum (https://blog.ethereum.org/2019/02/22/ethereum-constantinople-st-petersburg-upgrade-announcement …), the fork is scheduled to happen on Feb 28th (block 7,280,000) and not before it. Please make sure to review all market details when taking a position.

1099805287706316800.text: Important PSA: when this @AugurProject market was created, the #Constantinople fork was projected to happen on Feb 27th, so the market creator set the cut-off for determining whether the fork was successful to 2019-02-28T00:00:00Z.https://twitter.com/veil/status/1099134126400069632 …

1099134126400069632.text: The @ethereum #Constantinople fork is trading at 14% chance of success on @veil. You can buy Yes for 0.12 ETH (8.33 odds) or No for 0.95 ETH (1.05 odds) right now.http://app.veil.co/market/will-ethereum-constantinople-fork-happen-successfully-by-february-28th …

Notice to @veil users 

We have listed a new 5x leveraged $REP market that expires at 12am UTC on January 19, 2019. The bounds are reset according to the current $REP price so both Long and Short positions are equally leveraged.https://app.veil.co/market/rep-usd-2019-01-19-5x-2 …

1085297123887730689.text: At @veil we're bringing peer-to-peer markets mainstream. Reach out to @pfletcherhill, @trembleice, or @GrahamKaemmer if you're interested in working with us.

1085297123149570048.text:
Nominate an @AugurProject market for listing.

Submit an Augur market's ID (browse https://veil.co/markets  or @PredictionsGlbl), and we'll list the markets as soon as we can.https://app.veil.co/nominate

1085297121476018176.text:
Show-off your predictive performance.

One of our favorite features on @veil is the leaderboard. It tracks your performance across all markets and ranks you based on your returns.https://app.veil.co/leaderboard

1085297120934912001.text:
Predict which film will win the Academy Awards Best Picture.

We've created a market on @veil that lets you trade on which film will win this year's Best Picture prize.

1085297119039086595.text:
Trade @grinMW on Ethereum.

Congrats to @grinMW on the launch! Trade synthetic $GRIN on @veil as well as the likelihood of it being listed on @CoinMarketCap over the next two months.

1085297118464532481.text:
Speculate on the @ethereum gas price and hash rate.

@veil lets you trade on the network's 24 hour rolling gas price and hash rate, which we expect will be valuable hedging products for relayers and miners.

1085297117793374208.text:
Buy and sell 5x leveraged cryptocurrencies.

@veil makes it easy to buy leveraged long or short positions in $BTC, $REP, and $ZRX.

We foresee a not-so-distant future where millions of people create and trade in millions of markets. And we can’t wait to help make that a reality.

https://veil.co/

1082716264789794816.text:
Veil will initially support four categories of markets:
 Cryptocurrency derivatives
 Ethereum network hedging products
 Grin markets
 Academy Awards markets

1082716263674068992.text: Trading on Veil will be live on January 15, 2019. But you can sign up early now here: https://app.veil.co/signup .

1082716263153987584.text: Veil is a peer-to-peer prediction market and derivatives platform built on top of @AugurProject, @0xProject, and @ethereum.

1082716262524829697.text:
It's announcement time! 

We are thrilled to say that @veil will be live on Mainnet on January 15, 2019.

And we're proud to share that we've raised a seed round from @paradigm, @sequoia, and @1confirmation.

Let's bring @AugurProject mainstream.https://medium.com/veil-blog/introducing-veil-649036f9d492 …
